mapper.insert: insert into topic(topicid , usersid , booksid , num , contents , addtime ) values(#{topicid} , #{usersid} , #{booksid} , #{num} , #{contents} , #{addtime} )
mapper.update: update topic set usersid=#{usersid} , booksid=#{booksid} , num=#{num} , contents=#{contents} , addtime=#{addtime} where topicid=#{topicid}
mapper.select: select a.* , b.username , c.booksname from topic a , users b , books c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.booksid = c.booksid order by topicid desc
select a.* , b.username , c.booksname from topic a , users b , books c where 1=1 and a.usersid = b.usersid and a.booksid = c.booksid and topicid=#{topicid} order by topicid desc
